div.p: Names and indices of the 52 molecules in the AlphaML showcase database. (1–5) DNA/RNA nucleobases; (6–20) uncharged canonical amino acids ( L-type); (21–25) popular pharmaceutical molecules; (26–29) open-chain and cyclic carbohydrates; and (30–52) 23 isomers of C 8H n. Throughout this work, these molecules will be specified by “showcase” followed by the corresponding index (padded to four digits with leading zeros, e. g., showcase0001 to showcase0052).
